ivardefs.name: definition
ivardefs.desc: Where the formal definition can be found. If a server references the base definition of an Operation (i.e. from the specification itself such as ```http://hl7.org/fhir/OperationDefinition/ValueSet-expand```), that means it supports the full capabilities o

ivardefs.name: documentation
ivardefs.desc: Documentation that describes anything special about the operation behavior, possibly detailing different behavior for system, type and instance-level invocation of the operation.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: The name of the operation or query. For an operation, this is the name  prefixed with $ and used in the URL. For a query, this is the name used in the _query parameter when the query is called.

properties.desc: Definition of an operation or a named query together with its parameters and their meaning and type. Consult the definition of the operation for details about how to invoke the operation, and the parameters.
